sentences.en: Carry make this village savor agriculture machinery changed benefit.
sentences.cn: 运输使这个村尝到了“农机化”的甜头.

sentences.en: He used to say that argument adds a savor to conversation.
sentences.cn: 他一向认为争论为谈话添加情趣.

sentences.en: His humorous remarks added a savor to our conversation.
sentences.cn: 他幽默的话语给谈话增添了风趣.

sentences.en: I will. I want to savor this last cup of Italian coffee before I head back.
sentences.cn: 我会的. 回去之前,我想要好好品尝这最后一杯的意大利咖啡.

sentences.en: Instead of feeling guilty, savor and love every bite -- you deserve it.
sentences.cn: 不要有负罪感，享受并且珍爱每一次咀嚼的滋味——你值得拥有。

sentences.en: Life a pattern of experience to savor, not endure.
sentences.cn: 生活是一种享受, 而不是一种忍受.

sentences.en: Life should be a pattern of experience to savor, not endure.
sentences.cn: 生活应是一种值得享受, 而不是忍受的经历模式.

sentences.en: Move slowly and savor the journey before you jump into romance.
sentences.cn: 在坠入爱河之前,要放慢速度充分享受这段美好时光.

sentences.en: No moment will ever repeat. Savor time with family and friends.
sentences.cn: 光阴一去不复返,要享受和家人朋友共聚的时光.

sentences.en: Savor of pottery and porcelain flourishing fire among them benefit.
sentences.cn: 盛火陶瓷尝到了其中的甜头.

sentences.en: The multi - balcony combination, savors Chinese olive season sunlight to savor heartily.
sentences.cn: 多阳台组合, 尽情品味橄榄季阳光品味.

sentences.en: The soup has a savor of onion.
There was a savor , of insolence in his manner.
sentences.cn: 他的态度有些傲慢的样子.

sentences.en: This soup has a savor , of garlic.
Well, I'm just thinking he should savor his next birthday cake.
sentences.cn: 唔, 我只是说他应该好好享受一下明年的生日蛋糕.

sentences.en: Wit adds ( a ) savor , to conversation.
sentences.cn: 机智给谈话添加 情趣.

words.tran_cn: 可口的；风味极佳的；味美的
缺少风味的；不风趣的，无情趣的
